task.question: How did God curse the animal that deceived Eve? (Genesis 3:14)

choices.choice: He bound it to the skies and forbade it to ever perch and rest
He caused it to be constantly hunted by all other animals
He forced it to live on the ground and in the dust
He sent it to live under the ground and never see light

task.answer: He forced it to live on the ground and in the dust

task.question: How did God say mankind was similar to Him? (Genesis 3:22)

choices.choice: They could know good from evil
They could feel joy and sorrow

task.answer: They could know good from evil

task.question: Why did God protect the tree of life?  (Genesis 3:22)

choices.choice: So that Adam and Eve would not lose the ability to bear children
So that man would live forever
To ensure that He could never be destroyed
So that man couldn't obtain a means to live forever

task.answer: So that Adam and Eve would not lose the ability to bear children

task.question: What did God place at the east of the garden of Eden to guard the tree of life? (Genesis 3:24)
What did the Lord do for Adam and Eve before He exiled them? (Genesis 3:21)
On what day of Creation were the first humans made? (Genesis 1:27,31)
Where was the first male human created? (Genesis 2:7-8)

choices.choice: Somewhere before the Garden of Eden was planted

task.answer: Somewhere before the Garden of Eden was planted

task.question: Where was the first female human created? (Genesis 2:15,21-25)

choices.choice: Somewhere before the Garden of Eden was planted

task.question: Who was/were the first to be commanded by the LORD to not take of the tree of the knowledge of good and evil? (Genesis 2:15-18)

choices.choice: Eve, on the day she was created
